title: Tegal Wangi Cliff Jump Adventure (Half-day)
overview: Discover the hidden cove of Tegal Wangi Beach, famous for its natural jacuzzis, cliff jumping, and sunset views.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the beach, natural pools, and cliff jump spots.
Enjoy the sunset from the cliffs.

title: Tegal Wangi Beach & Hidden Cove (Full-day)
overview: A full day of adventure at Tegal Wangi Beach, including cliff jumping, exploring natural pools, and relaxing in a secluded cove.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy cliff jumping, swimming, and exploring the natural jacuzzis.
Relax and have a picnic in the secluded cove.
Watch the sunset from the cliffs.
